werk.statt.codes
☰

test crosstalk

Austria plotly crosstalk

Drawing on public data from Viennas school administration I look at how many percentages of pupils in each primary schoos subsequently leave for schools offering eventually a higher education entrance qualification (Matura). The main interest is in contrasting these ratios between closely (geo-)located schools.

true
12-02-2020 
df_main <- readr::read_rds(here::here("_blog_data", "Vienna_primary_schools", "df_main.rds"))

bgr_color<- readr::read_file(file=here::here("theme.css")) %>% 
  str_extract(., regex("(?<=background-color:).*?(?=;)")) %>% str_trim()


shared_df_main <- df_main %>%
  filter(distance < 500) %>%
  filter(school_erhalter_indicator == "ffentl.-ffentl.") %>%
  select(-contains("details"))

# create a crosstalk object
shared_df_main <- SharedData$new(shared_df_main,
  key = ~pair_indicator,
  group = "pair_indicator"
)



# plot: x axis geographical distance;


plot_distance_diff <-
  plot_ly(
    data = shared_df_main,
    mode = "markers",
    type = "scatter",
    hoverinfo = "text",
    text = ~ paste(
      "abs diff AHS ratio (% points):", round((diff_abs * 100), 2),
      "</br>AHS factor:", round(diff_factor, 2),
      "</br>distance (m):", round(distance, 0),
      "</br>", tooltip
    )
  ) %>%
  add_trace(
    # text=~tooltip,
    marker = list(color = "orange"),
    x = ~distance,
    # y=~diff_factor,
    y = ~ scales::percent(diff_abs),
    showlegend = F
  ) %>%
  layout(
    title = list(
      text = "<b>Schools' different AHS ratios and geographical distance</b>",
      x = 0
    ),
    font = list(family = "Roboto Condensed"),
    xaxis = list(title = "distance between schools in meters"),
    yaxis = list(title = "absolute difference of AHS ratios (% points)"),
    plot_bgcolor = bgr_color,
    paper_bgcolor = bgr_color
  )

# plot_distance_diff



# map
# name package::; otherwise confusiong with leaflet addcircle => error

cross_map2 <- plotly::plot_mapbox(
  data = shared_df_main,
  hoverinfo = "text",
  text = ~ paste(
    "abs diff AHS ratio (% points):", round((diff_abs * 100), 2),
    "</br>AHS factor:", round(diff_factor, 2),
    "</br>distance (m):", round(distance, 0),
    "</br>", tooltip
  )
) %>%
  plotly::add_markers(
    y = ~school_1_lat,
    x = ~school_1_long,
    color = "#FF0000" #,
    # text = ~address1
  ) %>%
  plotly::add_markers(
    y = ~school_2_lat,
    x = ~school_2_long,
    color = "#FF0000" # ,
    # text = ~address2
  ) %>%
  layout(
    mapbox = list(
      style = "mapbox://styles/zoowalk/ckjrkv7065tf519oax4nadm2k",
      margin=list(l=0,r=0,t=0,b=0,p=0),
      zoom = 10,
      center = list(
        lat = 48.21,
        lon = 16.3720798
      )
    ),
    showlegend = FALSE,
    paper_bgcolor = bgr_color
  ) %>% 
    config(mapboxAccessToken = Sys.getenv("MAPBOX_TOKEN"))


# combine graphs

cross_plot <- crosstalk::bscols(
plot_distance_diff,
cross_map2)
#



cross_plot <- crosstalk::bscols(
plot_distance_diff,
cross_map2)


library(htmltools)
# cross_plot <- browsable(tagList(plot_distance_diff, cross_map2))
cross_plot <- browsable(tagList(cross_plot))
# cross_plot

# see here for how to remove bootstrap css which otherwise messes up you blogdown's css
# https://github.com/rstudio/crosstalk/issues/26

unstrap <- function(x) {
  attr(x, "html_dependencies") <-
    Filter(
      function(dependency) {
        dependency$name != "bootstrap"
      },
      attr(x, "html_dependencies")
    )
  x
}

cross_plot_clean <- unstrap(cross_plot)

cross_plot_clean
